item.title: Oil prices rise to kick off 2025, boosted by a stronger demand outlook
item.description: Oil futures began 2025 on a positive note, boosted by expectations for stronger demand.

item.title: Google’s antitrust woes spark analyst downgrade of Alphabet’s stock
item.description: JMP Securities cited “the risk of antitrust penalties that could significantly impact Google’s U.S. distribution of search and search revenue.”

item.title: Tesla’s first-ever drop in sales is a bearish sign for 2025. Will autonomous vehicles be enough?
item.description: Tesla’s “golden goose” will be a robotaxi, one analyst says.

item.title: Widen the aperture for space stocks to watch in 2025 — the story doesn’t begin and end with SpaceX and Boeing
item.description: After a big year for SpaceX — and one of misfortune for Boeing — here’s what to expect in the new year.

item.title: Neumora Therapeutics’ stock craters after trial of major depressive disorder fails to meet main goals
item.description: The news is a setback for the clinical-stage biotech and a drug that proved successful in earlier trials.
